me.ulrichBarnstedt.libOutput.render

Class Container

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.ulrichBarnstedt.libOutput.render.Element
      • me.ulrichBarnstedt.libOutput.render.Container

  • public class Container
extends Element
    Container class for use in UI. Can contain other elements, can have a border. Supports colors, padding, and other functions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Container(boolean showBorder, boolean vertical, Element... elements)

      • Container

        public Container(boolean showBorder,
                 boolean vertical,
                 Element... elements)
        Parameters:
        showBorder - If the container has a border
        vertical - If the elements are aligned vertical (else horizontal)
        elements - An optional list of predefined elements
